events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to request a refund immediately because this is unacceptable.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product in the shipment.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah for handling the refund process promptly.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the wrong item you received and your order number so I can verify and proceed?
I have attached the photo of the item I received along with the order number 1234567 as requested.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send you a return shipping label.
I appreciate your quick response and the offer of a full refund. Thank you for resolving this quickly.
The refund process has been completed and the return label emailed. Please let us know if further assistance is needed.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since you have confirmed the refund was received and there are no further issues, we are closing this support case.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email so you can rate your support experience with us today.
